channel.title: Deatch Match Gravity Setting
channel.description:
Hello,
I am trying to create a low-gravity killbox type environment with the Black Mesa dedicated server. sv_gravity works, however, once it gets below a certain value (I think 400), I can no longer jump. Is this a known bug, or maybe intended behavior?
Thanks for any help.
